hero.title: Germany Services
hero.headline: German Precision in Supply Chain Transparency
hero.subtext: Live reports and AI insights for Europe’s most advanced supply chains.

context.title: Strategic Context
paragraphs: Germany’s supply chains are a benchmark for efficiency and quality.
Live transparency supports market access and consumer confidence across Europe.

items.name: Hedamo Report
items.text: Live, structured reports for import programs and buyers.

items.name: Hedamo AI
items.text: Policy and program intelligence to prioritize categories and suppliers.

items.name: Hedamo Code
items.text: Consumer-facing facts at the point of choice—multilingual and consistent.

benefits.title: Key Benefits
bullets: Support supply chain leadership with consistent data
Improve buyer confidence and reduce ambiguity
Strengthen consumer trust across European markets

vision.title: Success Vision
vision.text: Germany’s supply chains are recognized for live, trusted product information.

cta.blurb: Live, interactive reports—policy, buyer, and consumer views.
